means: 花梗，梗，（肿瘤或息肉的）肉茎

sentence.Network_en: Single dark blue - violet, one or more per peduncle, very floriferous.
sentence.Network_cn: 单瓣深蓝至紫罗兰色花, 每个节有一甚至更多的花梗, 很会开花.

sentence.Network_en: Single medium lavender - blue, 3 - 7 per peduncle, hides under leaves, short - lived.
sentence.Network_cn: 单瓣花,中薰衣草色到蓝色, 每个花梗有3-7朵花,容易藏在叶子里, 花期短.

sentence.Network_en: Each nut grows inside a small, pear - shaped peduncle — a false fruit.
sentence.Network_cn: 每颗腰果位于一条梨形的小肉茎中, 也就是假果.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 18th cent.: from modern Latin pedunculus, from Latin pes, ped- 'foot'

means.word_mean: 1. the thin process of tissue that attaches a polyp to the body
2. stalk bearing an inflorescence or solitary flower
3. a bundle of myelinated neurons joining different parts of the brain
